languages.text: "Нихель укрепила наш союз осторожностью Деменца, придирчивого и застенчивого аудитора, искателя опасностей. Я поддержал наш гений пылающей верой воителя Тарзуса, чтобы отогнать тени ложных идей. Аксиоманта, бродившая по грани обращения в малатека, была избрана нами за преданность беспощадной логике и холодность прозектора, с которой она изучала наши теории".

"Nihel reinforced our union with the prudence of Dementz, a meticulous and reserved auditor, a danger-seeker. I strengthened our genius with the fiery faith of the warrior Tarzus, in order to banish the shadows of false ideas. Axiomantha, who teetered on the brink of becoming a malatek, was chosen by us for her loyalty to ruthless logic and her cold scrutiny, or indeed dissection, of our theories."
languages.original_text: "Нихель укрепила наш союз осторожностью Деменца, придирчивого и застенчивого аудитора, искателя опасностей. Я поддержал наш гений пылающей верой воителя Тарзуса, чтобы отогнать тени ложных идей. Аксиоманта, бродившая по грани обращения в малатека, была избрана нами за преданность беспощадной логике и холодность прозектора, с которой она изучала наши теории".

traits.locale_text: "Nihel reinforced our union with the prudence of Dementz, a fault-finding and bashful auditor, a danger-seeker. I strengthened our genius with the fiery faith of the warrior Tarzus, in order to banish the shadows of false ideas. Audacia, who teetered on the brink of turning into a Malatek, was chosen by us for her loyalty to ruthless logic and her cold manner of scrutinising, or indeed dissecting, our theories."

languages.text: 「ニヘルはデメンツの慎重さを利用して自分たちの団結を強化しました。デメンツは極めて几帳面で堅苦しい監査役にして、危険を追い求める者。自分は戦士ターザスの燃えさかる信仰心で才能を強化しました。不誠実な考えという影を消し去るために。アクシオマンサはマラテックになりかけていましたが、自分たちの理論を無情な論理と客観性を排した調査で検証し、実に詳細に分析する誠実さから選ばれたのです」
languages.original_text: "Nihel reinforced our union with the prudence of Dementz, a meticulous and reserved auditor, a danger-seeker. I strengthened our genius with the fiery faith of the warrior Tarzus, in order to banish the shadows of false ideas. Axiomantha, who teetered on the brink of becoming a malatek, was chosen by us for her loyalty to ruthless logic and her cold scrutiny, or indeed dissection, of our theories."

traits.locale_text: 「ニヘルはデメンツの慎重さを利用して自分たちの団結を強化しました。デメンツは極めて几帳面で堅苦しい監査役にして、危険を追い求める者。自分は戦士ターザスの燃えさかる信仰心で才能を強化しました。不誠実な考えという影を消し去るために。アクシオマンサはマラテックになりかけていましたが、自分たちの理論を無情な論理と客観性を排した調査で検証し、実に詳細に分析する誠実さから選ばれたのです」
「ニヘルはデメンツの慎重さを利用して私たちの団結を強化した。デメンツは極めて几帳面で堅苦しい監査役にして、危険を追い求める者。私は戦士タ－ザスの燃えさかる信仰心で才能を強化した。不誠実な考えという影を消し去るために。アクシオマンサはマラテクになりかけていたが、私たちの理論を無情な論理と客観性を排した調査で検証し、実に詳細に分析する誠実さから選ばれた」

languages.text: “有了妮赫尔与德曼兹的谨慎态度，我们的聚合意识变得更加坚不可摧。德曼兹不仅拥有着一丝不苟的态度，还勇于探索危险。此外，我还用战士塔祖斯的炽热信念强化了我们的才能，驱散了错误思想的阴影。那个时候，阿修曼塔正在异端思想边缘摇摇欲坠，即将踏上歧途。我们之所以选择她，是因为她忠于无情的逻辑，能对我们的理论进行冷酷的审视，或者确切地说，是进行剖析。”
languages.original_text: "Nihel reinforced our union with the prudence of Dementz, a meticulous and reserved auditor, a danger-seeker. I strengthened our genius with the fiery faith of the warrior Tarzus, in order to banish the shadows of false ideas. Axiomantha, who teetered on the brink of becoming a malatek, was chosen by us for her loyalty to ruthless logic and her cold scrutiny, or indeed dissection, of our theories."

traits.locale_text: “有了雅珀与德曼兹的谨慎态度，我们的聚合意识变得更加坚不可摧。德曼兹不仅拥有着一丝不苟的态度，还勇于探索危险。此外，我还用战士塔祖斯的炽热信念强化了我们的才能，驱散了错误思想的阴影。那个时候，阿修曼塔正在异端思想边缘摇摇欲坠，即将踏上歧途。我们之所以选择她，是因为她忠于无情的逻辑，能对我们的理论进行冷酷的审视，或者确切地说，是进行剖析。”
“有了妮赫尔与德曼兹的谨慎态度，我们的聚合意识变得更加坚不可摧。德曼兹不仅拥有着一丝不苟的态度，还勇于探索危险。此外，我还用战士塔祖斯的炽热信念强化了我们的才能，驱散了错误思想的阴影。那个时候，阿修曼塔正在异端思想边缘摇摇欲坠，即将踏上歧途。我们之所以选择她，是因为她忠于无情的逻辑，能对我们的理论进行冷酷的审视，或者确切地说，是进行剖析。”

languages.text: « Nihel a consolidé notre union avec la prudence de Dementz, un auditeur méticuleux et réservé, bien qu'assez aventurier. J'ai renforcé notre génie avec la ferveur du guerrier Tarzus afin de bannir l'ombre de toute idée profane. Nous avons ensuite choisi Axiomantha, qui était sur le point de devenir malatek, pour sa logique imparable et sa capacité à analyser nos théories de manière si objective que l'on pourrait presque parler de dissection. »
languages.original_text: "Nihel reinforced our union with the prudence of Dementz, a meticulous and reserved auditor, a danger-seeker. I strengthened our genius with the fiery faith of the warrior Tarzus, in order to banish the shadows of false ideas. Axiomantha, who teetered on the brink of becoming a malatek, was chosen by us for her loyalty to ruthless logic and her cold scrutiny, or indeed dissection, of our theories."

traits.locale_text: « Nihel a consolidé notre union avec la prudence de Dementz, un auditeur méticuleux et réservé, bien qu'assez aventurier. J'ai renforcé notre génie avec la ferveur du guerrier Tarzus afin de bannir l'ombre de toute idée profane. Nous avons ensuite choisi Audacia, qui était alors sur le point de devenir malatek, pour sa logique imparable et sa capacité à analyser nos théories de manière si objective que l'on pourrait presque parler de dissection. »

languages.text: «Nihel reforzó nuestra unión con la prudencia de Dementz, un auditor meticuloso y reservado, un buscador de peligros. Yo fortalecí nuestro genio con la fe ardiente del guerrero Tarzus, con el fin deshacernos por completo de las falsas ideas. Elegimos a Axiomantha, que estaba al borde de convertirse en una malatek, por su lógica inquebrantable y su exhaustiva capacidad de análisis, o más bien disección, de nuestras teorías».
languages.original_text: "Nihel reinforced our union with the prudence of Dementz, a meticulous and reserved auditor, a danger-seeker. I strengthened our genius with the fiery faith of the warrior Tarzus, in order to banish the shadows of false ideas. Axiomantha, who teetered on the brink of becoming a malatek, was chosen by us for her loyalty to ruthless logic and her cold scrutiny, or indeed dissection, of our theories."

traits.locale_text: «Nihel reforzó nuestra unión con la prudencia de Dementz, un auditor meticuloso y reservado, un buscador de peligros. Yo fortalecí nuestro genio con la fe ardiente del guerrero Tarzus, con el fin deshacernos por completo de las falsas ideas. Elegimos a Audacia, que estaba al borde de convertirse en una Malatek, por su lógica inquebrantable y su exhaustiva capacidad de análisis, o más bien disección, de nuestras teorías».

languages.text: "Nihel hat unsere Union durch die Weisheit des Dementz verstärkt, eines gewissenhaften und reservierten Prüfers, eines Gefahrsuchenden. Ich habe unser Genie durch den flammenden Glauben des Kriegers Tarzus gestärkt, um die Schatten falscher Ideen zu verbannen. Axiomantha, die am Abgrund taumelte und fast zum Malatek geworden wäre, wurde von uns erwählt ob ihrer Loyalität der gnadenlosen Logik gegenüber und ihrer kalten Prüfung, nein Sezierung, unserer Theorien."
languages.original_text: "Nihel reinforced our union with the prudence of Dementz, a meticulous and reserved auditor, a danger-seeker. I strengthened our genius with the fiery faith of the warrior Tarzus, in order to banish the shadows of false ideas. Axiomantha, who teetered on the brink of becoming a malatek, was chosen by us for her loyalty to ruthless logic and her cold scrutiny, or indeed dissection, of our theories."

"Nihel hat unsere Union durch die Weisheit des Dementz verstärkt, eines gewissenhaften und reservierten Prüfers, eines Gefahrsuchenden. Ich habe unser Genie durch den flammenden Glauben des Kriegers Tarzus gestärkt, um die Schatten falscher Ideen zu verbannen. Axiomantha, die am Abgrund taumelte und fast zum Malatek geworden wäre, wurde von uns erwählt ob ihrer Loyalität der gnadenlosen Logik gegenüber und ihrer kalten Prüfung, nein Sezierung, unserer Theorien."

languages.text: "Nihel, birliğimizi Dementz'in sağduyusuyla güçlendirdi. O da titiz ve mesafeli bir denetçiydi, tehlikeye atılma eğilimindeydi. Ben dehamızı, savaşçı Tarzus'un hiddetli inancıyla güçlendirdim. Amacım, sahte fikirlerin düşürdüğü gölgeleri bertaraf etmekti. Teküfran olmanın eşiğindeki Axiomantha'yı, merhametsiz mantığı ve soğuk tahkik kabiliyeti nedeniyle seçtik. Teorilerimizi didik didik edip incelemesini istiyorduk."
languages.original_text: "Nihel reinforced our union with the prudence of Dementz, a meticulous and reserved auditor, a danger-seeker. I strengthened our genius with the fiery faith of the warrior Tarzus, in order to banish the shadows of false ideas. Axiomantha, who teetered on the brink of becoming a malatek, was chosen by us for her loyalty to ruthless logic and her cold scrutiny, or indeed dissection, of our theories."

traits.locale_text: "Nihel, birliğimizi Dementz'in sağduyusuyla güçlendirdi; titiz ve mesafeli bir denetçiydi ve tehlikeye atılma eğilimindeydi. Ben dehamızı, savaşçı Tarzus'un hiddetli inancıyla güçlendirdim; amacım sahte fikirlerin düşürdüğü gölgeleri bertaraf etmekti. Bir Teküfran olmanın eşiğindeki Axiomantha'yi, merhametsiz mantığı ve soğuk tahkik kabiliyeti nedeniyle seçtik; teorilerimizi didik didik edip incelemesi için."
